original_title: 水俣一揆 ─一生を問う人びと─
overview: Second film in Tsuchimoto's series on Minamata disease - the victims of Minamata disease negotiate directly with Chisso Corporation (responsible for dumping toxic water into Minamata Bay) for life-long medical care and compensation.
title: Minamata Revolt: A People's Quest for Life
